channel.title: Adding items to item.cfg
channel.description:
ok, whenever I try to add Godswords, it compiles fine, but when I run my server, it gives me an error
I add the item ID's to the end of my item.cfg list...
what am I doing wrong?
Im using Devolution 6.0 by the way =]

item.title: Adding items to item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

-.-

the dueling thing

opening up a new interface during a duel will cause items to be duped

back to my thread =D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2008, 09:56:22 PM[/size][hr][quote=“delta, post:8, topic:176789”][quote author=openice123 link=topic=237557.msg2020836#msg2020836 date=1201591470]
umm this isnt a you duped on my server thread this is a help thread
and like noob slayerz said your not supposed to add just the item id

  • to those who said they duped
    your fualt you have a glitch on your server
    fix it if you dont want people duping or else be quite and dont post
    [/quote]
    How can we fix it I think somebody said bakatool can’t find the problem[/quote]tell him to ask winten then?

o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items to item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

delta:

Hey your that guy who dupes on my server[/quote][quote=“Noob Slayerz, post:3, topic:176789”]His the guy that duel dupes on my server -.-"[/quote][quote=“Rawr lol, post:4, topic:176789”]hes the guy who exposed himself and duped on my server -.-

first thats all spam/ 2nd for ur question make sure ur item.cfg when u add the item is like this

item = 15334 God_Sword A_God_Sword. 132000000 132000000 132000000 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70 70
like that but smaller size item = id# itemname itemdescription price price price bonus bonus… and so on make sure there are 17numbers for bunuses like in this 1 also make sure u use tab not space
